title: Slim Pickins

description.plain:
“Slim Pickins” delves into the process of trying to find the right guy—someone who’s attractive, kind, and smart, but not having a lot of luck in that endeavor. As she finds that it’s “slim pickings” (very few good things to choose from), she ponders the idea of ending up alone and decides to just settle for someone she doesn’t really love.

Carpenter first performed the track at the Grammy’s Museum on August 2, 2024. It was the only song to have been performed or directly teased prior to the album’s release.

embed_content: Read “Slim Pickins” by Sabrina Carpenter on Genius
recording_location: Sharp Sonics Studios (Los Angeles), Electric Lady (New York) and Big Mercy Sound (New York)

I am not dramatic
These are just the thoughts that pass right through me
All the douchebags in my phone

Oh, it's slim pickings

I'll just keep on moanin' and bitchin'

If I can't have the one I love

I'll just keep on moanin' and bitchin'
